channel.title: Pit Bull Toys Review » Stuffed toy
channel.description: Toys that stand up to bully breed jaw power

item.title: Lamb Chop Stuffed Toy
item.dc:creator: Pit Bull Toys
item.description: Time to destroy: 5 minutes* Like all stuffed toys that meet a pit bull’s jaws, Lamb Chop’s song ended quickly. Our tester went straight to tearing out the squeak bladders—starting with the one in the head. Because of the swiftness … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Time to destroy: 5 minutes*

Like all stuffed toys that meet a pit bull’s jaws, Lamb Chop’s song ended quickly. Our tester went straight to tearing out the squeak bladders—starting with the one in the head.

Because of the swiftness with which he went for the bladders, we removed the toy from his reach after he chewed through the face fabric . To date, the toy isn’t fully destroyed, however it’s a safety hazard for him to continue “playing” with it, so we count it as destroyed and keep it out of reach.

Where to buy, though we don’t recommend it for bully breeds

The Lambchop Multipet Plush Dog Toy can be found online and in many stores that sell pet toys. Ours came from the local Target.
